mapper.select: /* sql : codeRepository.findByCodeGrpId */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, MEMO, ORD, CASE WHEN ORD = '' THEN '99999' ELSE ORD END AS ORDS, USE_YN, CREATED_AT, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_GRP_ID = #{code_grp_id} ) A ORDER BY CAST(ORDS AS INTEGER) asc, CODE_ID asc
mapper.insert: /* sql : codeRepository.save */ INSERT INTO TB_CODE ( CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, MEMO, ORD, CREATED_AT, CREATED_ID ) VALUES ( 'CD'||LPAD(nextval('SEQ_CD')||'', 8, '0'), #{code_grp_id}, #{code_nm}, #{code_val}, #{memo}, #{ord}, now(), #{created_id} )
mapper.select: /* sql : codeRepository.findByCodeGrpVal */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CODE_ID, A.CODE_NM, A.CODE_VAL, A.CODE_GRP_ID, CASE WHEN ORD = '' THEN '99999' ELSE ORD END AS ORDS FROM TB_CODE A, TB_CODE_GRP B WHERE A.CODE_GRP_ID = B.CODE_GRP_ID AND B.CD_GRP_VAL = #{code_grp_val} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ) A ORDER BY CAST(A.ORDS AS INTEGER) ASC
